links.*: Of the Coming of the Elves and the Captivity of Melkor

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1|Year of the Trees 1000|Year of the Trees 1050|Year of the Trees 1080|Year of the Trees 1085|Year of the Trees 1086|Year of the Trees 1090}}

* After [[Yavanna]] grew the [[Two Trees of Valinor]] on the hilltop [[Ezellohar]] to give a [[Light of Valinor|new light]] to Arda, [[Telperion]] blooms alone at the [[Opening Hour]]; on the second hour, the [[First Day]] comes, and the [[Time|Count of Time]] begins with it.<ref name=Quenta>{{S|Days}}</ref><ref>{{MR|P2a}}, entry 3500, §§ 25-9, pp. 55-6</ref>
* For one thousand Years of the Trees the [[Valar]] dwell in bliss in [[Valinor]] beyond the [[Pelóri|Mountains of Aman]], while all [[Middle-earth]] lay in a [[twilight]] under the [[Stars]].<ref name=Quenta/><ref name=Annals>{{MR|P2e}}, entry [YT] 1, § 30, p. 70</ref>
* Over the next many ages [[Morgoth|Melkor]] sleeps in [[Utumno]], and [[Oromë]] hunts down the Enemy's monstrosities throughout Middle-earth.<ref name=Quenta/><ref name=Annals/> Melkor raises the [[Misty Mountains|Hithaeglir]] in an attempt to hinder his efforts.<ref>{{S|Captivity}}</ref><ref>{{MR|P2g}}, entry 1115, § 61, pp. 82-3</ref>
